trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> property.
This represents the schema information (name, allowed values, and so on) of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> property.
Because this is just schema information, there is no field such as "Value" to get/set the value of this property.

If you manually instantiate this class, call <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.BeginInit%2A> before you set the first property of the object and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.EndInit%2A> after you set the last property.
Default constructor.
Required for deserializtion from a persisted format.
Gets or sets a list of arguments for this property.
This field is optional.
Returns the list of arguments for this property.
See <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the category to which this property belongs.

If the value of this field does not correspond to the `Name` property of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.Category%2A> element that is defined in the containing <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> class, a default <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.Category%2A> that has this name is auto-generated and added to the containing <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> class.
This field is optional and is culture-invariant.
When this field is not specified, this property is added to an auto-generated category named General (localized).
This field cannot be set to the empty string.
Returns the name of the category to which this property belongs.
Gets or sets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> that contains this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
Returns the rule that contains this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
Gets or sets the data source where the current value of this property is stored.
If the data source is defined, it overrides the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.DataSource%2A> property on the containing <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule>.
This field is mandatory only if the parent <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> does not have the data source initialized.

The getter for this property returns only the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.DataSource%2A> that is set directly on this <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> instance.
Returns the data source where the current value of this property is stored.
Gets or sets the default value for this property.
This field is optional.
If the value is a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.StringProperty>, semantics determine whether this field is culture-sensitive.
Returns the default value for this property.
Gets or sets a description of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref> for use by a prospective UI client.
This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.
Returns the description of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
Gets or sets a name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.
When this property is not set, it is assigned the same value as the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.Name%2A> property (and, therefore, would not be localized).
Returns the display name of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
See <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit"></xref>.
Gets or sets the keyword that is used to open the help page for this property.

This form of specifying help takes precedence over <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpUrl%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpFile%2A> + <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpContext%2A>.
This field is optional and is culture insensitive.
Returns the keyword that is used to open the help page for this property.
Gets or sets the Help context to use when the user presses F1.
This property uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpFile%2A> property to display the Help context of the specified Help file.
This field is optional.

If this property, together with <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpFile%2A>, is specified, then the value of <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpUrl%2A> is ignored.
Returns the Help context to use when the user presses F1.
Gets or sets the Help file to use when the user presses F1.
For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpContext%2A>.
This field is optional and is culture-insensitive.
Returns the Help file to use when the user presses F1.
Gets or sets the URL of the Help page for this property.
The page is opened when the user presses F1.
This property has a higher priority than the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpContext%2A>+<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpFile%2A> properties.
In other words, these properties are ignored if <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.HelpUrl%2A> is set.
This field is optional and is culture-insensitive.
Returns the URL of the Help page for this property.
Gets or sets a hint to the command-line constructor whether to include this property in the command line.
Some properties are used only by the targets and are not to be included in the command line.
Other properties, for example, task parameters, are included in the command line in the form of the switch/value that they emit.
This field is optional and, by default, has the value `true`.
Returns the hint to the command-line constructor.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether this property is required to have a value set.
Returns a flag that indicates whether this property is required to have a value set.
Gets or sets additional attributes of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
This can be used as a grab bag for additional metadata of this property that are not captured by the primary fields.
Use custom UI to interpret the additional metadata because the shipped UI formats are not aware of these attributes.
This field is optional.
Returns additional attributes of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether this property allows multiple values to be supplied/selected simultaneously.
Returns a switch that specifies whether this property allows multiple values to be supplied/selected simultaneously.
If true, multiple values may be selected.
Gets or sets the name of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
This field is mandatory and culture-invariant.
The value of this field cannot be set to the empty string.
Returns the name of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether this property is read-only.
This field is optional and its default value is `false`.
Returns `true` if this is a read-only property; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the token used to separate a switch from its value.
The value specified here overrides the value specified for the parent rule separator.
This field is optional and culture-invariant.
Returns the token used to separate a switch from its value.
Gets or sets the subcategory this property belongs to.
Returns the subcategory this property belongs to.
Gets or sets the switch representation of this property when the property represents a tool parameter.
This field is optional and culture-invariant.
Returns the switch representation of this property.
Gets or sets the prefix for the switch representation of this property when this property represents a tool parameter.
The value specified here overrides the value specified for the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.SwitchPrefix%2A> of the parent <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule>.
This field is optional and culture-invariant.
Returns the prefix for the switch representation of this property.
Gets or sets the list of value editors for this property.
This field is optional.
Returns the list of value editors for this property.
Gets or sets a hint to the UI client that tells it whether to display this property.
This field is optional and has the default value `true`.
Returns a hint to the UI client that tells it whether to display this property.
